.@PatrickMcHenry: I want to reiterate my support of an extension of the #ExIm Bank, the authorities to ensure the Bank remain open to support US jobs & exports and job creation around the globe. .@PatrickMcHenry: To be clear, Republicans support selling American goods and services around the globe & in China. That's why we support the reset of the trading arrangement w/China that @POTUS is negotiating.
.@PatrickMcHenry: If we want to counter Beijing's ambitions, we shouldn't use #ExIm to provide cheap financing for the Chinese Communist Party. pic.twitter.com/PWeJbp5Fb4

.@PatrickMcHenry: Earlier this year, Chairwoman Waters and I joined together to introduce a bipartisan #ExIm reauthorization bill. Sadly, Democrats walked away from that agreement because it limited Ex-Im subsidies to some businesses owned by the #ChineseCommunistParty. pic.twitter.com/BLFfJOHw2i
